definition: The word "aufhörst" refers to the action of discontinuing or ceasing a particular activity or behavior. It is commonly used in the context of giving instructions or commands, indicating that someone should stop doing something.

examples.german: Du hörst nie auf, mich zu überraschen.
examples.english: You never cease to surprise me.

examples.german: Er hörte auf, Fußball zu spielen.
Wenn du so weitermachst, hörst du bald auf, Freunde zu haben.
examples.english: If you keep going like this, you will soon stop having friends.
